metadata.title: CVE-2024-47746 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fuse: use exclusive lock when FUSE_I_CACHE_IO_MODE is setThis may be a typo. The comment has said shared locks arenot allowed when this bit is set. If using shared lock, thewait in `fuse_file_cached_io_open` may be forever.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
